Text.Page:
I'm about sick of handing these things out. There's always something that needs killing.

Go kill {@LinkCreature:12#2#bay kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:12#3#arachnen stalkers}, and {@LinkCreature:12#22#Red Lash enforcers}. They'll be around the north harbor coastline.

Talk to Lenia when you're done. Now scram.
Keep up the good work, <PCCLASS:lcase>. For the federation!
You'll need to finish the job, you know.
